japanese:
おおー！
ここも、古宇利島（こうりじま）に
負けないくらい綺麗な海ですね！
translation:
Ohh!
This beach is just as beautiful
as the one at Kouri Island!

japanese: しかも今日も良い天気！
translation: And the weather is great today too!

japanese:
ええ、きっと
らいはちゃんの日頃の行いが良いからですね。
translation:
Yes, it's probably because the good weather follows 
Raiha-chan.

japanese:
ふふん、当然だな！
らいはの徳に感謝しろお前たち！
translation:
Heheh, of course!
Be grateful for Raiha's qualities, you guys!

japanese: ははー！　ありがとうございます！
translation: Haha! Thank you very much!

japanese:
ねー、フータロー君？
海に感激する気持ちもわかるけどさ――
translation:
Hey, Futaro-kun?
I know you're impressed by the sea and all, but...

japanese:
君の場合、それよりも先に
感想を言うべきことがあるんじゃないかな？
ねえ、二乃？
translation:
Did you notice what your sweetheart is wearing right now 
just for you? Right, Nino?

japanese:
あ……。
いや、その……。
translation:
Ah...
Um, well...

japanese:
（なんか意識しちまって
　タイミングを逃したんだよ……！）
translation: (I got too self-centered and missed the timing...!)

japanese:
二乃も、あれだけ気合い入れて選んでたんだから、
もっと見せればいいのに。
translation:
You put in so much effort into choosing your swimsuit,
Nino, so you should show it off more.

japanese:
水着を新調したのは私だけじゃないわ。
あんたたちだって新しいのを買ったじゃない。
translation:
I'm not the only one who got a new swimsuit.
You guys bought new ones too, didn't you?

japanese: ほらほら、フータロー君。
translation: Come on, Futaro-kun.

japanese:
あー……。
その、似合ってると思うぞ？
translation:
Ah...
I think it looks good on you.

japanese: ホント？
translation: Really?

japanese: 本当だ！
translation: Really!

japanese:
俺はファッションなんて疎いから
どこがどうとは言えないが――
translation: I don't know much about fashion, so I can't say what's good or not...

japanese: か、可愛いと思う。
translation: B-but I think it's cute.

japanese: ありがと、風太郎！
translation: Thanks, Futaro!

japanese: おう……。
translation: Okay...

japanese:
いやぁ、初々しいねえ。
付き合いだしたばかりって感じで
思わずニヤけちゃうなぁ。
translation:
You two are so adorable.
It's like you guys just started dating and
I can't help but grin at the sight.

japanese:
もうニヤニヤだろうが。
ったく、俺たちは見世物じゃねぇぞ。
translation:
Stop grinning. 
Come on, we're not a show for you to watch.

japanese:
いいじゃないですかー。
私は、幸せのお裾分けをもらってる気分ですよ？
translation:
Why not?
I feel like I'm receiving a bit of your happiness
by just watching. Right guys?

japanese:
確かに、そういう感覚はありますね。
見ているこちらも心が温かくなります。
translation:
True! 
It warms our hearts watching you too.

japanese: でも、あんまりのろけられるのは、ちょっと。
translation: But, please don't get too lovey-dovey.

japanese:
あー！
こうなるから
お前らの前では言いたくなかったんだよ！
translation:
And that's why I didn't want to say it
in front of you guys! It'd end up like this!

japanese: じゃあ、いつ言ってくれるつもりだったの？
translation: So when were you planning to tell me?

japanese: そ、それは……。
translation: W-well...

japanese: ２人きりになったタイミングで？
translation: When the two of you were alone?

japanese: つまり、２人きりになるつもりだったんだ。
translation: So you were planning on being alone together.

japanese: ここから愛の逃避行を！？
translation: Is this the beginning of two lover's who are trying to escape?

japanese: 駆け落ち！？
translation: Are you going to elope?

japanese:
なんでそうなる！
なにから逃げるんだよ！
translation:
Why should we be doing that?
What are we running away from?

japanese:
ちょっとあんたたち。
風太郎を困らせないで。
translation:
Guys stop it now.
Don't bother Futaro.

japanese: あの、この方向に話を振ったのは二乃では？
translation:
Um, wasn't it you, Nino,
who brought up this topic?

japanese:
ふー……。
一泳ぎしたし、少し休憩するか。
translation:
Whew...
I'm going to take a break after that swim.

japanese: 私、四葉さんともうちょっと泳いでくるね。
translation: I'm gonna swim a little more with Yotsuba-san.

japanese: 私も、もう少し泳ぎたい気分です。
translation: I'll join you guys for a bit too.

japanese: よーし、そういうことなら沖まで競争だー！
translation: Alright, let's race to the ocean!

japanese: おい、あまりはしゃぎすぎるんじゃないぞ？
translation: Hey, don't get too excited.

japanese: はーい！
translation: Okay!

japanese:
（二乃たちは一足先に海から上がっていたはずだが。
　どこにいったんだ？）
translation:
(Nino and the others
 should have gotten out of the water.
 Where did they go?)

japanese:
あ、風太郎！
ちょうどよかったわ、
いま呼びに行こうと思ってたの。
translation:
Ah, Futaro! Good,
I was looking for you.

japanese: なんだ？
translation: What is it?

japanese:
浮き輪を借りたんだ。
寝そべってプカプカできるくらい大きいの。
translation:
I rented a big float that's perfect for making ourselves 
comfortable.

japanese:
のんびり海に浮かんで過ごそうと思ってさ。
君もどう？
translation:
I thought we could relax together on it.
What do you think?

japanese:
そんなにでかいのがあるのか。
ああ、いいんじゃないか？
translation:
They have something that big?
Ah, sure, why not?

japanese: じゃ、私と風太郎で１つね！
translation: Then let's share one, just the two of us!

japanese: へっ？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
２人用の浮き輪なのよ。
いいでしょ？
translation: It's a two-person float. Isn't it perfect?

japanese: あ、いや、問題ないぞ？
translation: Well, it's fine with me.

japanese:
若い２人はいいですなぁ。
でも、羽目を外しすぎないようにね。
translation:
Young couples are so lovely.
But be careful not to get too carried away.

japanese: 隣に浮いて見張ってるから。
translation: We'll be floating next to you and keeping an eye on you.

japanese: 見張ってんのかよ！
translation: Keeping an eye on us?!

japanese:
いやいや、冗談。
ねえ三玖？
translation:
We're just kidding.
Right, Miku?

japanese: 三玖ぅ？　冗談よね？
translation: Mikuuu? You're kidding, right?

japanese: うん、冗談。
translation: Yes, we're kidding.

japanese: （ホントかよ……）
translation: (Really...?)

japanese:
はあ……。
これ、思った以上に気持ちいいわ。
translation:
Wooow...
This is more relaxing than I thought.

japanese:
ああ……。
波のゆれってのは心地良いな。
translation:
Yeah... 
The sway of the waves feels so good.

japanese:
（心地良くはあるんだが、
　この状況はリラックスにはほど遠い……！）
translation:
(It feels nice,
 but this situation is far from relaxing...!)

japanese:
風太郎、寝たりしないでよ？
ここで寝返りを打ったら海に落ちちゃう。
translation:
Futaro, don't fall asleep, okay?
If you toss and turn here, you'll fall into the sea.

japanese: お、おう、気をつける。
translation: O-okay, I'll be careful.

japanese:
ホテルで、眠そうだったわよね？
夕べ眠れなかった？
translation:
You looked very sleepy at the hotel, you know?
Didn't you get enough sleep last night?

japanese:
えっ！？
あ、いや、そんなことはないぞ？
translation: Huh?! N-no, that's not it, ok?

japanese:
だったら、いいけど。
私のせいかと思って……。
translation: Well, as long as it wasn't because of me...

japanese: （二乃のせいではあるんだが！）
translation: (Actually, it was because of you!)

japanese:
けど、寝不足じゃなくても、
こうしてたら眠くなってくるわね。
translation:
But even if it's not because of sleep deprivation,
I'm starting to feel sleepy like this.

japanese:
こ、これが１／ｆゆらぎってやつか！
知ってるか、これはパワースペクトル密度が――
translation:
Th-this must be the so-called 1/f fluctuations!
You know, the power spectral density...

japanese:
もう、そういうのはいいから。
家庭教師と生徒の時間はとっくに終わってるのよ？
translation:
Enough with that already.
The time for the tutor and student role is long over, you know?

japanese: すまん……。
translation: Sorry...

japanese:
（落ち着け、俺。
　二乃のほうから提案されたとはいえ、
　これは――チャンスだ）
translation:
(Calm down, Futaro.
 Even though it was Nino who suggested it,
 this...is a chance.)

japanese: （うまく会話を誘導して……）
translation: (Try to lead the conversation skillfully...)

japanese: ふわぁ……。
translation: *yawn*

japanese:
その、ナントカゆらぎの効果なのかしら。
本当に眠くなってきちゃった。
translation:
I wonder if it's because of the effects
of that fluctuation thing.
I'm really starting to feel sleepy.

japanese:
ねえ風太郎。
腕枕、してくれない？
translation:
Hey, Futaro.
Can you lend me your arm as a pillow?

japanese: さすがにちょっと……人目もあるしな。
translation: Ah, that's a bit tough...people are watching.

japanese: 大丈夫よ、海の上だから誰も見ていないわ。
translation: Don't worry, no one's watching since we're on the ocean.

japanese: それは、確かにそうかもしれないが……。
translation: Well, that may be true, but...

japanese:
いいじゃない、少しくらい。
ねっ、風太郎。
お願い。
translation:
Come on, just for a little while.
Isn't that okay, Futaro?
Please?

japanese: お、俺の腕は硬いから止めとけ！
translation: M-my arms are too boney! Don't do it.

japanese:
ぷっ！　なにそれ？
言い訳にしては苦しすぎでしょ。
translation:
Pft! What is THAT?
That's too lame to be an excuse.

japanese: ……うるさい。
translation: ...Quiet.

japanese:
それに、本当に硬くてもいいわよ？
そんなことくらい気にしないもの。
translation:
Besides, even if your arm really is boney,
I don't mind? Don't worry about it.

japanese:
ねっ、風太郎？
腕枕して？
translation:
Come on, Futaro.
Can I use your arm as a pillow?

japanese: わかった、こっちに来い。
translation: All right, come here.

japanese: どうかしたか？
translation: What's wrong?

japanese:
う、ううん、まさか即答されるとは
思ってなくて……ちょっと驚いちゃった。
translation:
N-nothing, I didn't think
you'd answer immediately...
I was just a little surprised.

japanese: 本当に、してくれるの？
translation: Really, you'll do that for me?

japanese: ああ、男に二言はない。
translation: Yeah. A man doesn't go back on his word.

japanese: ……ありがと。
translation: Thank you.

japanese: じゃ、じゃあ……お邪魔します。
translation: W-well then...don't mind me.

japanese: おう……。
translation: Okay...

japanese: ……二乃？
translation: ...Nino?

japanese: やっぱり、いい。
translation: No it's nothing, forget it.

japanese: は？　なんでだ？
translation: Huh? Why?

japanese: その……。
translation: Well...

japanese:
ほ、ほら！
風太郎の腕がしびれたら申し訳ないもの。
translation:
L-look!
I don't want to be responsible
if your arm gets numb, Futaro.

japanese: あ、あと……そ、その……。
translation: U-um... W-well...

japanese:
と、とにかく、いまはいいわ。
言い出しておいてごめんなさい。
translation:
A-anyway, I'm fine now.
Sorry for bringing it up.

japanese: いや、別にいいが。
translation: No, it's okay.

japanese:
えーと……どうする？
そろそろ戻るか？
translation:
So...what should we do?
Should we go back now?

japanese:
ううん……。
もうちょっと、こうしてたい。
translation:
No...
I want to stay like this a little longer.

japanese: わかった。
translation: Got it.
